name: Grand Dark Trader
description:
This is a Dark Trade Simulation.
after a Serious panthemic, Sanctioned Contries are mostly more serious controlled than before, and their nations are more living poorly... so, Maid robot CFS-4 who Asylum in Kyiv is decide a trade to those contries...
but that behavior is too risky, so she is directed a plan and try them...
You Must export a few items to Sanctioned areas such as commidities, Essential Infrastuructures, or Even Video Console Devices...
be careful due to Sanctioned areas of Landmines, get Panelty of Sanctions or Other Dangerousities...
if you succed to Bootlegging, You can Receive a Their Rewards, such as Borisu, Rotary Engine Generator, even refugees, etc...
and in Main Tower, You can Trade a Stocks or Investment to Real Estates... or even Craft a new Adapted Handheld for Dark Trade...
in that case be careful to Sanctioned in Office PCs...
also You can Travel via Travel Tickets to few areas. in this situations you can stay in hotel, shopping center(Hyso, Ixia, etc...), or play a Minigame in Arcade Machine...
or if you in Kyiv District incl. Main Tower, you can give a Mission sometimes and also you can use an Vehicle audio if you in Kyiv Main Street... or even enjoy a arcade or enjoy a few Int`l style food such as French Restaurant, etc...
